titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Great Yarmouth, June 6th. By R.S., M.A. and rector of [illegible] in the county of Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Scamler, Robert, b. 1653 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and sold by George Rose, bookseller in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With Biblical citations in marginal notes.
The state of the righteous -- Gods love to laps'd man.
